name: Gridroids Tower Defence by Jerem Watts
name_original: Gridroids Tower Defence by Jerem Watts
description:
I made this game in 24 hours, if there's enough interest i'll add more to it but the goal of this project was simply to see how much I could get done in a day.

Special Controls

 - Press space to place a mine - Press enter to detonate mines

this game is free, if it was sold to you you have been ROBBED.

this game was created by me, Jerem Watts 
- if you like it please e-mail me at jerem_watts@hotmail.com with advice on how to make it better! no seriously! I eventually respond to just about all e-mails

if you want to know when I make an even better game, come to 
https://www.facebook.com/FinalOcto/

That's my facebook page. I only post concise ads and links to new games I publish to minimize boring fluff - saving your time and mine.
